articles.description: A man accused of tricking a 92-year-old woman with a £160 fake coronavirus vaccine has been charged by police.
articles.content:
A man accused of tricking a 92-year-old woman with a £160 fake coronavirus vaccine has been charged by police.

articles.description: IS your neighbourhood’s rate of coronavirus infection higher or lower than the Highlands’ 178.9 cases per 100,000 people? Read on to find out.
articles.content:
